import React, { useState } from 'react' import API from "../utils/API"; import '../containers/Profile.css' function Item() { const [item, setItem] = useState({ title: "", description: "", location: "", price: "", photoURL: "", category: "", phone: "" }) const handleSetItem = (e) => { console.log('we r typing!!', e.target.name) setItem({ ...item, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSaveItem = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); API.saveItem(item); }; return (
